Not much better was Clara’s Heart (1988), an overly sentimental drama with…
data.text:
In Robert Mulligan

Kiss Me Goodbye (1982), however, was a dull romance about a widow (Sally Field) whose relationship with a professor (Jeff Bridges) is threatened when the ghost of her first husband (James Caan) appears. Not much better was Clara’s Heart (1988), an overly sentimental drama with…

Read More

In Claire Trevor

…Murder Your Wife (1965); and Kiss Me Goodbye (1982), her final film. Trevor occasionally returned to the stage, and she also made a number of television appearances. For one of her TV performances, in a revival of Dodsworth (1956), she was honoured with an Emmy Award.
